name: read-xaffinity-resource
description:
Read an xaffinity:// resource by URI.

Available resources:
- xaffinity://data-model - Conceptual guide to Affinity's data model (READ THIS FIRST)
- xaffinity://me - Current authenticated user
- xaffinity://me/person-id - User's person ID in the CRM
- xaffinity://interaction-enums - Interaction type/direction enum values
- xaffinity://saved-views/{listId} - Saved views for a list (pre-configured filters in Affinity UI)
- xaffinity://workflow-config/{listId} - Workflow config: list info, status field options, saved views
- xaffinity://field-catalogs/{listId|entityType} - Field schema for a list (by ID) or entity type (person/company/opportunity)

Tip: Read xaffinity://data-model to understand when to use 'company ls' vs 'list export'.

uri.description: The xaffinity:// resource URI. Use 'xaffinity://data-model' for the data model guide.
